```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(beeswarm)
```

```{r}
salamanders <- read_csv("mack_creek_vertebrates.csv") %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  filter(species == "DITE")

view(salamanders)

salamander_violin <- ggplot(data = salamanders, 
                            aes(x = section, y = length1)) +
  geom_violin()

salamander_violin

salamander_og <- salamanders %>% 
  filter(section == "OG")
```
